Colossal.effect: At the end of each of your turns, Heal this unit for 2.

Leprechaun.effect: Whenever you gain Charges from a Card other than by this effect; you gain 1 additional Charge.

High-Elf Shaman.effect: Action: Take 2 Damage; deal x1 Damage.

Trophy Beast.effect: When this Unit dies; The Player that killed it gains 10 Mana.

G'ok the Moving Earth.effect: The maximum amount of Damage that can be dealt to this unit each turn is 10.

Magic Presence.effect: Friendly units adjacent to this unit have +2 Power.

Bandit Chieftain.effect: Action: Pay 1 Mana. Add a Card that has a Mana cost greater than 2 Mana from your Deck to your Hand.

Arch-mage.effect: When you spend 3 or more Mana; Gain 1 Power.

The Ferryman.effect: Action: Pay 2 Mana; add 1 Card from your Discard pile to your Hand.

King's Brood.effect: At the start of your Turn, summon 2 Minions.

Clockwork, the Great Machine.effect: After placing a Building, except from this effect, you can place 1 extra Basic building. Has double range when placing Buildings.

Sage of the Forest.effect: Each turn the first Action, Bonus Action, Move Action, or Reaction used by Sage of the Forest counts as a Quick Action.

Succubus.effect: Units Damaged by this Unit cannot move further than 3 Tiles away from this Unit during their next turn.

Werewolf.effect: Action: Deal 2 Damage; This Unit gains 1 Move Action.
